entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 3:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -15.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Snow near the Rockies in the evening. Amount 4 cm near the Rockies. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
